name: places/ChIJrWpEXt1YwokRmTch57J0tsg
formattedAddress: 170 E 78th St, New York, NY 10075, USA
adrFormatAddress: 170 E 78th St, New York, NY 10075, USA

originalText.text: I was recently referred to Dr. Healy by another doctor for heart related issues. I went in very scared because I've never had any issues with my heart before. Upon my first interaction with Dr. Healy, I immediately calmed down. She is kind, compassionate, beyond knowledgeable, and has an excellent bedside manner. Talked me through everything thoroughly; the tests, the results, the next steps. I never feel rushed during my visits. Dr. Healy extends herself to her patients - made me feel supported at all times. Offered to speak with my family as well as checking in with me multiple times outside of the office when my symptoms spiked. When I started to feel better, I felt her joy. Honestly, she just cares. Despite seeing her for cardiology only originally, I am now continuing care with her as my internist. HIGHLY recommend!

originalText.text: Dr. Healy has been my Cardiologist since 2017. When treating you she leaves no stone unturned to find out the etiology of one's  cause of cardiac problems. Dr. Healey also has a wealth of expert colleagues to call upon for consultations.
